items.sentence: They say Tom\'s brain isn\'t functioning anymore.
It looks like your luggage is on the next flight.
It took me more than a month to get over my cold.
Tom was offered a leading role in a horror movie.
Tom was smart not to sell his house at that time.
Tom was three meters away when the bomb exploded.
Tom is in the living room, watching sports on TV.
Tom knows better than to go out alone after dark.
Tom left his key on the desk, as he usually does.
Would you mind if I speak to Tom alone for a sec?
